     1  package env
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"fmt"
     5  	"strings"
     6  
     7  	"github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/util"
     8  	genericUtil "github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/util"
     9  
    10  	"github.com/spf13/cobra"
    11  	ktemplates "k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/util/templates"
    12  )
    13  
    14  // RecommendedCommandName is the recommended env command name
    15  const RecommendedCommandName = "env"
    16  
    17  const (
    18  	nameParameter                 = "Name"
    19  	nameParameterDescription      = "Use this value to set component name"
    20  	projectParameter              = "Project"
    21  	projectParameterDescription   = "Use this value to set component project"
    22  	debugportParameter            = "DebugPort"
    23  	debugportParameterDescription = "Use this value to set component debug port"
    24  )
    25  
    26  var envLongDesc = ktemplates.LongDesc(`Modifies odo specific configuration settings within environment file`)
    27  
    28  // NewCmdEnv implements the environment configuration command
    29  func NewCmdEnv(name, fullName string) *cobra.Command {
    30  	envViewCmd := NewCmdView(viewCommandName, util.GetFullName(fullName, viewCommandName))
    31  	envSetCmd := NewCmdSet(setCommandName, util.GetFullName(fullName, setCommandName))
    32  	envUnsetCmd := NewCmdUnset(unsetCommandName, util.GetFullName(fullName, unsetCommandName))
    33  	envCmd := &cobra.Command{
    34  		Use:   name,
    35  		Short: "Change or view environment configuration",
    36  		Long:  envLongDesc,
    37  		Example: fmt.Sprintf("%s\n\n%s\n\n%s",
    38  			envViewCmd.Example,
    39  			envSetCmd.Example,
    40  			envUnsetCmd.Example,
    41  		),
    42  	}
    43  
    44  	envCmd.AddCommand(envViewCmd, envSetCmd, envUnsetCmd)
    45  	envCmd.SetUsageTemplate(util.CmdUsageTemplate)
    46  	envCmd.Annotations = map[string]string{"command": "main"}
    47  
    48  	return envCmd
    49  }
    50  
    51  func printSupportedParameters(supportedParameters map[string]string) string {
    52  	output := "\n\nAvailable parameters:\n"
    53  	for _, parameter := range genericUtil.GetSortedKeys(supportedParameters) {
    54  		output = fmt.Sprintf("%s  %s: %s\n", output, parameter, supportedParameters[parameter])
    55  	}
    56  
    57  	return output
    58  }
    59  
    60  func isSupportedParameter(parameter string, supportedParameters map[string]string) bool {
    61  	for supportedParameter := range supportedParameters {
    62  		if strings.EqualFold(supportedParameter, parameter) {
    63  			return true
    64  		}
    65  	}
    66  
    67  	return false
    68  }
